body_content.explanation: of diseases, etc., able to be passed from one person or animal to another:
examples: Almost every transmissible disease has an incubation period during which the person is infected but not yet showing signs of disease.
To start a pandemic, the virus will have to be highly transmissible between humans.
The main thing is to educate people that foot-and-mouth disease is not transmissible to humans.
The Pill will not protect you against sexually transmissible infections.
